pullRequest.body:
This PR builds on a few previous PRs to clean up the import graph leading into `LinearAlgebra/Basis/Defs.lean`, by splitting up and reorganizing `LinearAlgebra/Finsupp.lean` into smaller files. The following new files replace the previous `Finsupp.lean`:

 * `Countable.lean`: countability of a vector space spanned by a countable family of vectors
 * `Finsupp/Defs.lean`: for the `LinearMap`-ifications of basic `Finsupp` functions such as `single`
 * `Finsupp/LSum.lean`: for the `LinearMap`-ifications of `Finsupp.sum` and related results
 * `Finsupp/LinearCombination.lean`: defines `Finsupp.linearCombination`
 * `Finsupp/Pi.lean`: results involving the module structure on `âº -> Î²`
 * `Finsupp/Span.lean`: results involving `Submodule.span`
 * `Finsupp/SumProd.lean`: results involving the `Sum`/`Prod`/`Sigma` types
 * `Finsupp/Supported.lean`: defines `Finsupp.supported`

Also rename `FinsuppVectorSpace.lean` into `Finsupp/VectorSpace.lean`.

I could also redo this PR to be independent of the previous PRs, although that makes it harder to see the final impact of the import changes and we'd need to do some shaking either way.

---

- [ ] depends on: #18610
- [ ] depends on: #18618 
- [ ] depends on: #18619 
- [ ] depends on: #18656

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

pullRequest.title: chore(LinearAlgebra/Finsupp): split Finsupp.lean into many smaller files
